content.raw:
also, Please let me know which version of the gazebo is used?, today I updated the gazebo source to the latest version in order to fix the previous errors and now I have errors related to using the latest version of the gazebo. I don't know why it happens, but maybe because of the latest changes in gazebo related to using gazebo::math and ignition::math. the errors that now I have:

librobocup3dsPlugin.so.0.1.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::physics::Model::SetLinearVel(gazebo::math::Vector3 const&)'
librobocup3dsPlugin.so.0.1.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::physics::World::RemoveModel(std::string const&)'
librobocup3dsPlugin.so.0.1.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::physics::Entity::SetWorldPose(gazebo::math::Pose const&, bool, bool)'
librobocup3dsPlugin.so.0.1.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::physics::Joint::GetAngle(unsigned int) const'
librobocup3dsPlugin.so.0.1.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::physics::World::GetModel(std::string const&)'
librobocup3dsPlugin.so.0.1.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::physics::Model::GetLink(std::string const&) const'
librobocup3dsPlugin.so.0.1.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::physics::Model::GetJoint(std::string const&)'
librobocup3dsPlugin.so.0.1.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::physics::World::InsertModelFile(std::string const&)'
librobocup3dsPlugin.so.0.1.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::physics::Model::SetAngularVel(gazebo::math::Vector3 const&)'
content.html:
also, Please let me know which version of the gazebo is used?, today I updated the gazebo source to the latest version in order to fix the previous errors and now I have errors related to using the latest version of the gazebo. I don't know why it happens, but maybe because of the latest changes in gazebo related to using gazebo::math and ignition::math. the errors that now I have:

librobocup3dsPlugin.so.0.1.0: undefined reference to gazebo::physics::Model::SetLinearVel(gazebo::math::Vector3 const&)' librobocup3dsPlugin.so.0.1.0: undefined reference togazebo::physics::World::RemoveModel(std::string const&)' librobocup3dsPlugin.so.0.1.0: undefined reference to gazebo::physics::Entity::SetWorldPose(gazebo::math::Pose const&, bool, bool)' librobocup3dsPlugin.so.0.1.0: undefined reference togazebo::physics::Joint::GetAngle(unsigned int) const' librobocup3dsPlugin.so.0.1.0: undefined reference to gazebo::physics::World::GetModel(std::string const&)' librobocup3dsPlugin.so.0.1.0: undefined reference togazebo::physics::Model::GetLink(std::string const&) const' librobocup3dsPlugin.so.0.1.0: undefined reference to gazebo::physics::Model::GetJoint(std::string const&)' librobocup3dsPlugin.so.0.1.0: undefined reference togazebo::physics::World::InsertModelFile(std::string const&)' librobocup3dsPlugin.so.0.1.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::physics::Model::SetAngularVel(gazebo::math::Vector3 const&)'
